name: animal-ink-project
description: Monorepo microfrontend: Next.js (shell) + MFE React+Vite (lecteur de musique) expos√© en Web Components.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:music-player" "npm run dev:template"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:shell && npm run build:music-player
scripts.build:ui: cd packages/ui && (npm ci --include=dev || npm install) && npm run build
scripts.build:vercel: npm run build:ui && cd apps/mfe-music-player && (npm ci --include=dev || npm install) && npm run build && mkdir -p ../shell/public/mfe && cp dist/music-player.es.js ../shell/public/mfe/music-player.es.js && cd ../shell && (npm ci --include=dev || npm install) && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/shell && npm install && cd ../mfe-music-player && npm install && cd ../../packages/ui && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.next packages/*/dist

author: Animal Ink
